name: Sylvan Invoker of Warm Weather
text: You can Special Summon this card from your hand while you control a "Sylvan" monster. Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to the effect activations of "Sylvan" monsters. You can send a Plant-Type monster from your hand or field to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Sylvan" monster from your GY with a different level than that sent monster. You can only use this effect of "Sylvan Invoker of Warm Weather" once per turn.
